TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FORMATETC extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: A generalized Clipboard format containing a target device, the aspect or view of the data, and a storage medium indicator.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The FORMATETC structure is used as a parameter in OLE functions and methods requiring data format information.
For more information about programming with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STATDATA.formatetc> structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
